title: Fundamental Gender-Based COVID-19 Infection and Hospitalization Prediction Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis and data processing experience
context.additional_context: Data-driven decision-making competency enhancement program for social domain practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can build a machine learning model predicting COVID-19 infection and hospitalization risks by gender.
Learners can analyze gender differences in how socioeconomic factors affect infection rates.
Learners can interpret evaluation metrics for predictive models reflecting medical data characteristics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
